summary: Phase 4 proof structure expanded with 3 sorries remaining. Phases 1-3 and 5 complete. The witness construction approach hits fundamental challenges: (1) consistency of {psi} ∪ BoxContent requires multi-family modal existence lemma, (2) Lindenbaum may add Box formulas breaking coherence. Documented possible resolutions for follow-up task.

artifacts.summary: Implementation summary documenting Phase 4 expansion and remaining sorries
Updated implementation plan with Phase 4 status and analysis

completion_data.completion_summary: Expanded Phase 4 proof structure for exists_fullySaturated_extension with detailed witness construction approach. 3 sorries remain due to fundamental challenges: multi-family modal existence lemma and Lindenbaum control. Phases 1-3 and 5 complete.
